name: INCILE DEMO
description:
As an urban explorer, you enter the abandoned tunnels beneath the city in search of adventure. But when a collapse traps you inside, you realize that you are not alone. With limited resources, you must fight to survive against the terrors that lurk in the darkness.

Controls:
  • WASD - Player/Boat movement
  • E - Use/Interact/Gett off boat
  • Left Ctrl - Crouch
  • F - Flashlight
  • R - Reload Weapon
  • Mouse0 - Fire/Use syringe

Short Demo Available
